query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guest_sessions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_code VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  expires_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_session_code (session_code),
  INDEX idx_expires_at (expires_at)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eNqdHnpnVAGVpu.root --database GJvAyc4uSA6Y5a2E3cgCYe --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guest_sessions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_code VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  expires_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_session_code (session_code),
  INDEX idx_expires_at (expires_at)
)
